Summary: cross shaped object in NW sky. At first thought it was a bright star. dimmed quickly.
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Corpus Christi
There were no other sightings in Corpus Christi on or around July 21st 2012
divs: Sighting Details I was in the house about 9 - 9:15 PM on the night of July 21, 2012 when my mother started to yell for me to come to the rear patio. when I went I saw what I perceived as a star or planet in the sky. It was very bright. I looked for my binoculars and when I returned it had been hidden by the clouds and was barely visible. It was cross shaped and stationary in the sky. It could have been a comet. I was curious if anyone else had seen something similar in South Texas.
